title: About the new jax skin god staff
body: hey guys, I got this new skin but when I went to check it in my skin collection I found it is not an epic skin in my collection... I mean the number of my epic skin owned didn't change and I found this skin under "OTHERS" not "EPIC". I know this is a really small issue but me as a skin collector, I really care about this. So did riot mess up or it supposed to be like this?

replies.body: Hmm could be just cause it's a new skin and they didn't have all the extra stuff in for it's release, not sure tbh. I'd recommend waiting a couple days and see if it fixes, and if there's no change check back.
